cputools
  • Reference
  • News

    Various helper functions

    A set up helper functions to standardise some R and package development and documentation.

    See also maker and the CPU wiki.

    See cputools() for an list of functions:

    library("cputools")
cputools()
    ## cputools functions:
##  biocVersions
##  color_picker
##  colour_picker
##  cputools
##  cpuwww
##  darken
##  ht
##  lighten
##  makeBiocBuildShield
##  makeBiocCovrShield
##  makeCodecovShield
##  makeDatName
##  makeFigName
##  makeGithubIssuesUrl
##  makeGithubPageUrl
##  makeGithubUrl
##  makeTravisShield
##  pdfpng
##  pkgqsts
